A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's appropriate that most of the action takes place on the bridge of two spaceships and the plot is centered around the bridge between Kylo and Rey\, because the entirety of this film serves as a mere bridge to the next installment in the franchise. But\, this bridge is a beautiful\, well-constructed one. You can perhaps find fault that the bridge is slightly too long and has too much congestion on the front end\, but by the home stretch\, it's a free-flowing highway that you can't help but want to speed towards the exit just to see how it ends.
